info.name: PSD E-Desk (Customizable Theme)
info.description: This is the Customizable Theme (Beta) for the PSD E-Desk Click Me < click this link only if you are a user of this site.
info.additionalInfo:
Update 2.0.0 
Customization 
I added customization so that you can customize this website the way you want it to be.
This feature is under BETA so some of the color combinations might not match the color of the text.
But I will update the style next time 
Enjoy :)
